title: Crafting
content: ing in Baldur's Gate 3 will require you to gather specific Materials and Ingredients which can then be combined in order to create a new item. In order to craft Potions with Alchemy you'll need to collect reagents throughout the world .You can press the "ALT" button to toggle any interactive element visible on your screen, this way it will be easier to find reagents.
